mng: surname Ruan, small state during the Shang Dynasty (1600-1046 BC) located in the southeast of modern-day Gansu Province

exm.mng: zhongruan or alto lute, like pipa 琵琶 but bigger and lower range
surname Ruan, small state during the Shang Dynasty (1600-1046 BC) located in the southeast of modern-day Gansu Province
Nguyễn Tấn Dũng (1949-), prime minister of Vietnam (2006-)
daruan or bass lute, like pipa 琵琶 and zhongruan 中阮 but bigger and lower range
Ruan Chongwu (1933-), third governor of Hainan
Nguyen An (1381-1453), aka Ruan An, Vietnamese architect and engineer, principal designer of the Forbidden City
